title: Implement tsk --version and tsk doctor
description: Version command shows version and build info. Doctor command checks: git installed, Python/Rust version, project exists, cache valid.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

custom.beads_notes:
Plan: add tsk --version and tsk doctor to Python and Rust CLIs; doctor checks git repo, project marker, config load; update CLI docs; run basic checks.
Implemented tsk --version and tsk doctor in Python and Rust. Added doctor modules and CLI wiring; updated CLI_REFERENCE with doctor and version. Ran rustfmt.
custom.beads_close_reason: Implemented tsk --version and tsk doctor in Python and Rust; docs updated.
